attributes.additional_details:
2nd attempt

Havering council have sold the land where the ice rink is situated to Morrisons supermarket. There will be at least a 2 year delay until the new one is open.
100's of children from 3years and upward who have lessons from 6am until late have lost the use of this, their dreams of being winter olympians.fading
I would like a temporary rink set in place before this one is closed, if they have t o close it at all
